page.title: 04EDUCATION
page.content: EDUCATION IN THE AREA IS COMPREHENSIVE.EDUCATION IS VALUED BY MOST PEOPLE. THERE ARE 4 SIX-YEAR COMPREHESIVES IN THE AREA AND 24 PRIMARIES.AS THIS IS SCOTLAND,PUPILS LEAVE PRIMARY AT AGE 11 AND GO STRAIGHT TO SECONDARY. THE KEYWORD IN EDUCATION AT THE MOMENT IS CHANGE THROUGHOUT THE SYSTEM FROM PRIMARY TO 18+. THE MAIN CHANGE IN SECONDARY IS IN THE 14-16 AGE GROUP WHERE 0-GRADES ARE BEING REPLACED BY STANDARD GRADES.THESE WILL ALLOW ALL PUPILS TO GAIN SOME KIND OF QUALIFICATION AT THE AGE OF 16. TEACHERS ARE NOW IN DISPUTE WITH THE GOVERNMENT OVER PAY. THERE HAVE BEEN DAYS OF INDUSTRIAL ACTION AND MANY TEACHING PERIODS HAVE BEEN LOST. STRIKES ARE LIKELY TO CONTINUE THROUGH 1986.
